info.title: ohsome API
info.description: This REST-based API aims to leverage the tools of the OSHDB through allowing to access some of its functionalities via HTTP requests. The official documentation can be found here.

tags.name: Elements Extraction
tags.description: Direct access to the OSM data

tags.name: Full History Elements Extraction
tags.description: Direct access to the full history of the OSM data

tags.name: Contributions Extraction
tags.description: Direct access to all contributions provided to the OSM data

get.summary: OSM contributions having the bounding box of each OSM object as geometry

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: clipGeometry
parameters.description: Boolean operator to specify whether the returned geometries of the features should be clipped to the query's spatial boundary (‘true’), or not (‘false’); default: ‘true’

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: List of possible property-groups added to each OSM-element: 'tags' and/or 'metadata' and/or 'contributionTypes' (only for the /contributions/{geometryType} endpoints); default: no property

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Two ISO-8601 conform timestrings defining an interval; no default value

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

post.summary: OSM contributions having the bounding box of each OSM object as geometry

parameters.description: List of possible property-groups added to each OSM-element: 'tags' and/or 'metadata' and/or 'contributionTypes' (only for the /contributions/{geometryType} endpoints); default: no property

get.summary: OSM Data, having the bounding box of each OSM object as geometry

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: clipGeometry
parameters.description: Boolean operator to specify whether the returned geometries of the features should be clipped to the query's spatial boundary (‘true’), or not (‘false’); default: ‘true’

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: List of possible property-groups added to each OSM-element: 'tags' and/or 'metadata' and/or 'contributionTypes' (only for the /contributions/{geometryType} endpoints); default: no property

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s) defining timestamps (/elements), or intervals (/elementsFullHistory); no default value

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

post.summary: OSM Data, having the bounding box of each OSM object as geometry

get.summary: OSM Data having the raw geometry of each OSM object as geometry

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: clipGeometry
parameters.description: Boolean operator to specify whether the returned geometries of the features should be clipped to the query's spatial boundary (‘true’), or not (‘false’); default: ‘true’

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: List of possible property-groups added to each OSM-element: 'tags' and/or 'metadata' and/or 'contributionTypes' (only for the /contributions/{geometryType} endpoints); default: no property

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s) defining timestamps (/elements), or intervals (/elementsFullHistory); no default value

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

post.summary: OSM Data having the raw geometry of each OSM object as geometry

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: List of possible property-groups added to each OSM-element: 'tags' and/or 'metadata' and/or 'contributionTypes' (only for the /contributions/{geometryType} endpoints); default: no property

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

text.description: Copyright info about the used data

url.description: URL to the copyright and license info

features.description: List of GeoJSON features containing the OSM data

description.description: Text describing the result in a sentence

executionTime.description: Time the server needed to execute the request

requestUrl.description: Request URL to which this whole output JSON was generated
